scripts.format:
prettier . -c && exit || echo '
Press enter to format ALL' && read && prettier . -w
scripts.dev: concurrently -n frontend,backend -c green,blue 'npm run dev -w frontend' 'npm run dev -w backend'
scripts.build: npm run build -w components && npm run build -w backend
scripts.build:all: npm run build -w components && concurrently -n frontend,backend -c green,blue 'npx nuxi build frontend' 'npm run build -w backend'
